amendment.description: To modify a finding relating to the defense strategy of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1282 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1282 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Romney. (consideration: CR S200; text: CR S200) To modify a finding relating to the defense strategy of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1282 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Romney.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1282 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
